page.title: 09TOWYN JUNIOR SCHOOL.
page.content: The present school was founded in 1950 in place of the former Towyn Church School.Mr J Hand,remained as Head until his retirement in 1964,when he was succeeded by Mr.Ffrancon Phillips who retired in 1977,and was succeeded by the present Head,Mr.I.S.Jones.The school has 8 classes,including a Special Unit for slow learners.There are 9 full time staff plus a peripatetic remedial reading teacher.The school has children from the ages of 7 to 11,most of whom transfer from Ysgol y Foryd Infants school which is housed on the same site,but in a separate building.There are at present 196 children on roll.At the age of 11 most children transfer to Ysgol Emrys ap Iwan in Abergele.
